title: Thoughts on this statement by Claria Janover? (Please check the link below) - Quora

response.answer_text: Claria seems to be very intelligent. She seems to be saying that her threat was a joke. Unfortunately, when you work for a consulting firm, you have to think at least 3 steps ahead of the consequences of any email you send, any phone call you make, any document you submit. Note: I am woefully behind on culture, having only seen a few Tik-toks. I have seen protests though, and sometimes they can be a sort of theatre. And there’s a place for that (even in the Supreme Court!).

I feel immensely sorry for her. In today’s world you have to think about the consequences before tweeting, etc. and realize that your personal life might explode. I am sure no matter which side you err on, your legacy will never leave you. In some ways, it chills free speech. On the other hand, I do believe that you have a right as an employer to say on or off the field, you represent us; same should go for police officers.
